title: NO FEE ! Convertible 3-BR in Upper West Side W79th St
posting_body: ['NO FEE !', 'Convertible 3-BR/2.5 Baths for 9/1.', 'Video is available per request.', 'Afantastic layout are just a few of the other great features this wonderful home offers.', 'Stainless steel appliances, and custom cabinetry.', 'Two bathrooms feature imported Italian Carrera marble and tri-view medicine cabinets.', 'In addition, there is a powder room in the living room for guests.', 'Plenty of closets include 1 large walk-in closet in the master bedroom.', '24-hour doorman and concierge, valet, on premise 24-hour parking garage, and laundry on every floor.', "a penthouse-level amenity floor that includes a stunning landscaped and furnished roof terrace with Central Park and Hudson River views, fitness center, resident lounge, childrens playroom, party room and racquetball court, all in what is arguably the Upper West Side's best location.", '***Photos are for illustrative purpose only***']
